modName: Skaal Winter Clothes for Kids V2
summary: Skaal winter clothes for your Children
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]1haM-ydGw38[/youtube][/center]
[b]Also available on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=205338426]Steam[/url][/b]
[b]
[size=4]Skaal winter clothing for your kids.[/size][/b]
It bothered me that all kids are wearing summer clothes even though they live in the snow so i added these winter suits for all adoptable Children.

[size=4][b]Requirements[/b][/size]
1. Skyrim
2. Heartfire DLC
3. Dragonborn DLC

[size=4][b]Features[/b][/size]
1. Buy (or steal) your clothes at the General store in Whiterun.
2. Theres also a Winter coat laying ready for yourself.
3. Gift winter clothing to any children.
[color=#33cc33]4.[b] Dress your kids properly for the current weather! When it's too hot tell them to put their summer clothes back on, when it snows tell them to dress warm.[/b][/color]

[size=4][b]Mods that go perfectly with this mod[/b][/size]
There's some great mods that would go perfectly with this mod if you also want the winter-clothes for your character. (The outfit for adults that is in this mod is just the standard one and cant be upgraded by a blacksmith)

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/32126-1-1361473143.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32126/?]Skaal heavy Armor by TumbaJamba and DVAted[/url]

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/31589-1-1360756254.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31589/?]Craftable and Temperable Skaal Clothing by Dark Knight Gafgar[/url]
[b]
[size=4]FAQ[/size][/b]

[b]Q[/b] I bought/stole the clothes but there is no dialog to gift them to my kids.
[b]A[/b] If dialog is not showing then save your game and load it again.

[b]Q[/b] I can't find the general goods store.
[b]A[/b] It's acros the street of the Tavern in Whiterun, you can buy them from Belethor or steal them from the backroom.

[b]Q[/b] Can you add the hat too?
[b]A[/b] Nope no hat, it clips terribly.

[b]Q[/b] Can i upload your mod on a other site?
[b]A[/b] No you dont have the required permissions to upload these files elsewhere.
author: GameplayCrush
